mean_cn: vt. 宣布放弃，抛弃；  vi. 放弃权利，垫牌；  n. 垫牌
mean_en: to say especially in a formal or official way that you will no longer have or accept (something) :to formally give up (something)
word_etyma: re反+nounce讲话，说出→反过来说→renounce否认
sentence: Okay, this is the day I renounce smoking for good!
sentence_trans: 好吧，从这天开始我决定再也不抽烟了。
